  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-statistic-cpp-/statisticinfo">StatisticInfo</a></>}>
This class is used in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/managedstatic">ManagedStatic</a> so that it is created on demand (when the first statistic is bumped) and destroyed only when llvm&#95;shutdown is called. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-statistic-cpp-/statisticinfo/#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">/// RegisterStatistic - The first time a statistic is bumped, this method is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">/// called.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#af204074bb99629a0b644be5a81b1a269"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#af204074bb99629a0b644be5a81b1a269">TrackingStatistic::RegisterStatistic</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If stats are enabled, inform StatInfo that this statistic should be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// printed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// llvm&#95;shutdown calls destructors while holding the ManagedStatic mutex.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These destructors end up calling PrintStatistics, which takes StatLock.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since dereferencing StatInfo and StatLock can require taking the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ManagedStatic mutex, doing so with StatLock held would lead to a lock</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order inversion. To avoid that, we dereference the ManagedStatics first,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and only take StatLock afterwards.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#ac316effa43b4fd54b6451be0a3cc3d69">Initialized</a>.load(std::memory&#95;order&#95;relaxed)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/smartmutex">sys::SmartMutex&lt;true&gt;</a> &amp;Lock = &#42;<a href="#ac984e1f297b2dac8cbf7c4cf8777e4ea">StatLock</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">    StatisticInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> = &#42;<a href="#a9d1a0181d192027598d0cf59a7291e5d">StatInfo</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a1094ec958353ee43bd8ffd18187b1160">sys::SmartScopedLock&lt;true&gt;</a> Writer(Lock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check Initialized again after acquiring the lock.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#ac316effa43b4fd54b6451be0a3cc3d69">Initialized</a>.load(std::memory&#95;order&#95;relaxed))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a38906af8cc37ba9ddf2260cf1e2b0483">EnableStats</a> || <a href="#a558f5c44426d0eb7abb82a65e8892d9a">Enabled</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.addStatistic(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remember we have been registered.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-statistic-cpp-/statisticinfo/#a66a9ccf524624d58bb8f87b75dcb2b34"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-statistic-cpp-/statisticinfo/#a66a9ccf524624d58bb8f87b75dcb2b34">StatisticInfo::reset</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a1094ec958353ee43bd8ffd18187b1160">sys::SmartScopedLock&lt;true&gt;</a> Writer(&#42;<a href="#ac984e1f297b2dac8cbf7c4cf8777e4ea">StatLock</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Tell each statistic that it isn&#39;t registered so it has to register</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// again. We&#39;re holding the lock so it won&#39;t be able to do so until we&#39;re</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// finished. Once we&#39;ve forced it to re-register (after we return), then zero</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Stat : Stats) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Value updates to a statistic that complete before this statement in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// iteration for that statistic will be lost as intended.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    Stat-&gt;Initialized = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    Stat-&gt;Value = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clear the registration list and release the lock once we&#39;re done. Any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pending updates from other threads will safely take effect after we return.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// That might not be what the user wants if they&#39;re measuring a compilation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// but it&#39;s their responsibility to prevent concurrent compilations to make</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a single compilation measurable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  Stats.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4956c1072998f3de28fb64a8979fcbf5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa5094c6f6a737f5a94596cdab0b2b449">llvm::PrintStatistics</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">  StatisticInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machineblockplacement-cpp/#a086f939e29b718dc5a01e4bcfe6af2a1">Stats</a> = &#42;<a href="#a9d1a0181d192027598d0cf59a7291e5d">StatInfo</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Figure out how long the biggest Value and Name fields are.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
